cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CC. 

The paper proposes a method for automated word puzzle generation using natural language processing techniques, which falls under the scope of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The method involves the use of topic models and semantic similarity measures, which are common techniques in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the potential applications of the method in educational settings, which could be relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) and computer science education (cs.CC).
